xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:NameOfTheCompany: Power Grid Corporation of India Limited
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: For further notes please refer published results
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL: Notes for Balance sheet : 1. Other non-current liabilities also includes Deferred Revenue of Rs 9859.86 crore as on 30.09.2023. 2. Trade Payables includes total outstanding dues of micro enterprises and small enterprises of Rs 32.34 crore as on 30.09.2023. 3. Non-current assets classified as held for sale includes assets classified as held for sale (current) of Rs 260.86 crore as on 30.09.2023. 4. Other non-current financial liabilities includes Lease Liabilities (Non-current) of Rs 38.59 crore and Other current financial liabilities includes Lease Liability (current) of Rs 3.32 crore as on 30.09.2023. Notes for Cash Flow Statement 1. Cash and cash equivalents (Closing Balance) includes Rs 639.27 crore held in designated accounts which is not available for use by the Company.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: Note- 1. The operations of the Company are mainly carried out within the country and therefore, geographical segments are not applicable. 2. Profit before tax including Regulatory Deferral Account Balance 3. Other Unallocable Expenditure net off Unallocable income includes Profit before Tax from Discontinued Operations
